sqlMap.update: UPDATE INTERVIEWEE SET INTERVIEWEE_PASSION = #interviewee_passion#, INTERVIEWEE_ABILITY = #interviewee_ability#, INTERVIEWEE_RESOLUTION = #interviewee_resolution#, INTERVIEWEE_STRATEGY = #interviewee_strategy#, INTERVIEWEE_RELATIONSHIP = #interviewee_relationship# WHERE PROJECT_NO = #project_no# AND MEM_ID = #mem_id#
